text: NEW YORK ( AP ) â€” ` ` Despacito'' dominated 2017, but it's still bringing success to Luis Fonsi and Daddy Yankee : The artists are the leading nominees at the iHeartRadio Music Awards. IHeartMedia announced Wednesday that Fonsi and Yankee scored seven nominations each, including song of the year for the tune's version with Justin Bieber. The fifth annual awards show will be held March 11 at the Forum in Inglewood, California. It will air live on TBS, TNT and truTV, and also on iHeartMedia radio stations. A slew of artists are behind the Latin hit makers with five nominations each, including Bruno Mars, Taylor Swift, Rihanna, DJ Khaled,
